attributes.action: Sack Sir John Bourn, Head of the NAO
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has just come to light due to the Freedom of Information Act, that the Head of the Government Audit Office, Sir John Bourn claimed nearly £27,000 entertainment expenses at top restauraunts such as the Dorchester, The Savoy and The Ritz. He has also claimed for travel expenses for him and his wife of around £350,000 which includes trips to the Bahamas and South Africa.
Is this a justified use of public money?, or another nose in the trough?.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
